response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, making it an attractive opportunity for you. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of collaborating with you on this exciting venture.", "product_price": 950000}
